MajorClaims.MC1: Professors could combine doing research and preparing good courses in a dynamic way
MajorClaims.MC2: professors should spend more time on preparing courses than research

Claims.C1: Only by developing students, can we have a better academic field
Claims.C2: the research takes up too much teaching time
Claims.C3: professors could teach students through research and projects
Claims.C4: professor should concern about preparing class
Claims.C5: professors should pay more attention on how to teach students rather than conduct research
Claims.C6: spending more time to nurture excellent students is more consequential to professors, rather than research

Premises.P1: conducting research is helpful for professors and students to some extent
Premises.P2: the precondition of doing research is growing students’ solid theory fundamental
Premises.P3: research could bring funding and latest achievements in the field
Premises.P4: professors should assist students to acquire knowledge
Premises.P5: The professors’ duty is to nurture students, and prepare excellent courses
Premises.P6: If professors spend a lot of time on research, he will cut the time on preparing courses is reduced, which may decrease the quality of classes
Premises.P7: The reason why people enter a university is that they want to learn cutting-edged technologies
Premises.P8: professors should provide well-preparation courses to convey the state-of-art knowledge for college and university students
Premises.P9: if professors are busy in doing research, ignoring preparing appropriate courses for students, it would ruin the reputation of universities
Premises.P10: Students are unsatisfied with the unprepared course, and the enrollment of universities may decline
Premises.P11: Many students would not choose these kinds of universities to study
Premises.P12: hardly can professors find assistants to help with projects
Premises.P13: Some students enjoy taking part in some research
Premises.P14: Through to use the equipment and invent their own work, they may get more experience in the process of research
Premises.P15: electronic students always invent new machines such as robots, MP3 and remote control car
Premises.P16: They can manage the electric theory in practical skills
Premises.P17: And some students will be rewarded by investing new inventions
Premises.P18: only under specific circumstance, when students master all of the systematic knowledge, can they accomplish research
Premises.P19: This is requires professors provide high quality courses
Premises.P20: It is adverse to the whole academic field
